mapper.select: select H.ORDER_HISTORY_ID, H.ORDER_NUMBER, H.ORDER_STATUS, H.ORIGIN_PRICE, H.USED_POINT, H.DONATION_PRICE, H.FINAL_PAY_PRICE, H.ECO_DEAL_QR_URL, H.MEMBER_ID, H.CREATED_AT, OP.ORDER_PRODUCT_ID, OP.PRICE, OP.QUANTITY, OP.CANCEL_STATUS, OP.ORDER_TYPE, OP.PRODUCT_ID, OP.DISCOUNT_PRICE, P.ECO_DEAL_STATUS, P.NAME as PRODUCT_NAME, P.IMAGE_URL as PRODUCT_IMAGE_URL from ORDER_HISTORY H join ORDER_PRODUCT OP on H.ORDER_HISTORY_ID = OP.ORDER_HISTORY_ID join PRODUCT P on OP.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID where H.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} order by H.ORDER_HISTORY_ID desc, OP.ORDER_PRODUCT_ID desc
